title: Woman: Bald
description:
A woman with a bald head. Can be used to represent a bald woman or a woman with a shaved head. May also be used to represent a woman experiencing hair loss from chemotherapy, alopecia, or other medical treatments or conditions.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman bald emoji features a gracefully rendered head with smooth skin, devoid of hair, celebrating individuality with Appleâ€™s signature soft lighting and naturalistic tones. The gentle curve of her head and the subtle hint of a neckline convey a sense of quiet strength and self-assurance. This emoji offers a powerful and inclusive representation of women, often used to express resilience, personal transformation, or to identify with a community.
